P

placeBet(int) - Method in class player.Gambler
If the Gambler is able to place a bet, the bet amount is updated and the method returns true; false otherwise.
playBlackjack() - Method in class blackjack.BlackjackGame
The main game loop for the blackjack application
playedDoubleDownHand() - Method in class player.Gambler
Updates the player's stats that the Gambler has double downed
playedDoubleDownHand() - Method in class player.PlayerStatistics
Denote that the player has placed a Double Down bet
player - package player
 
Player - Class in player
This Player Abstract Class holds most of the functionality for both the Gambler and Dealer.
Player() - Constructor for class player.Player
Constructs a basic player with a blank hand who has not busted
PlayerStatistics - Class in player
This class is able to calculate statistics to show how well the Gambler is doing.
PlayerStatistics() - Constructor for class player.PlayerStatistics
Constructs a basic PlayerStatistics object with all values set to 0
playGame() - Method in class blackjack.Blackjack
Main game loop for Blackjack Class
printHandInfo() - Method in class player.Player
Prints to the console the Player's hand total and each card in their hand.
ProjectTests - Class in test
This Class runs all the JUnit tests.
ProjectTests() - Constructor for class test.ProjectTests
 
pushedHand() - Method in class player.Gambler
Gambler pushed: no change to their total money and their bet is cleared
pushedHand() - Method in class player.PlayerStatistics
If player pushed with the dealer, increment hands pushed
